i can't even get the installer to finish, it keeps saying the the installation was aborted before it could complete. I've tried installing it 3 times now, that's usually the give-up-point. they say 3rd times a charm but this just isn't working man.

The digital signature is broken on ti_managers.dll and trueimagetools.exe I know this is because of the crack but why is it pre-cracked? why not just upload the crack?. I could then run it through sandibox and check out what's happening. It's suspicious. I just don't trust people enough to run pre-cracked and repacked executables. I'd strongly  advise people to not allow this program access to the net by using there firewall to block it. Always manually configure windows firewall when running cracked software off any torrent regardless of there status.
